title: Perform a Cycle Count
description: An inventory controller is assigned a set of locations to count to ensure inventory accuracy.

tasks.description: Get the list of locations and items to be counted for the day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the assigned cycle count task.

tasks.description: Go to a specified location, scan the location barcode, and count the physical quantity of the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately counts the items in the location.

tasks.description: Enter the counted quantity into the system. The system flags a discrepancy where the count does not match the system quantity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the count, and the system correctly identifies a variance.

tasks.description: For the discrepancy, create an inventory adjustment request for a supervisor to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a request to investigate the discrepancy.
